reviews.author: copilot-pull-request-reviewer
reviews.body:
## Pull Request Overview

This PR updates the metadata in the draft document for improved naming and clarity, and adds a Makefile for managing dependencies via submodules and symbolic links.
- Updated document metadata including title, docname, workgroup, and keywords.
- Changed the consensus flag from true to false.
- Added a Makefile to conditionally sync submodules or clone a template repository.

### Reviewed Changes

Copilot reviewed 3 out of 3 changed files in this pull request and generated no comments.

| File                                                        | Description                                                      |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| draft-schwenkschuster-oauth-spiffe-client-auth.md            | Updated metadata fields to reflect accurate document naming, title, and contact information. |
| Makefile                                                    | Introduces dependency management via submodules, symlink creation, or repository cloning.       |
